product_name: WD-40 BIKE Bike Frame Polish/Protectant - 8 oz.
long_description: Specially formulated by WD-40 BIKE to prevent the build-up of dirt, dust and grime, the Bike Frame Polish/Protectant in an 8 oz. bottle helps keep your bike frame sparkling clean. WD-40 BIKE Bike Frame Polish/Protectant restores scratched areas and the luster of clear coats, carbon or other finishes, and helps treated surfaces stay clean longer.
short_description: Specially formulated by WD-40 BIKE to prevent the build-up of dirt, dust and grime, the Bike Frame Polish/Protectant in an 8 oz. bottle helps keep your bike frame sparkling clean.
